reviewText: I bought this for my brother-in-law because he is an F1 nut! He loves this video. It's just raw footage of cars going around the course. You hear the screaming of the engine (noise to some, music to others) and the squealing of tires.  That's about all there is to it.  Still, it's very interesting footage for any racing fan.
summary: F1 Footage - No more, no less.

reviewText: One of the best in car footage films out there. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0

reviewText: This was just okay. Nothing new for any Formula 1 fan. The footage is good, but there is better out there.
summary: Interesting and some good older film
Title: N/A

reviewText: Seeing the historic drivers and tracks from the on-board view can not be beat. Many of the laps are practice sessions, not race or qualifying "flying" laps. Only half of the DVD is on-board, the other :30 is a recap of past F1 World Champs.Reason for 3 star rating, more on-board race/qualifying footage from the early years of F1 and less filler at the end.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I really loved this DVD. It has tons of amazing, hard to find, footage but it is for hardcore fans only as it will be boring to those that are not.
Title: N/A
